episodes.title: The P3do Nazi Cult You’ve NEVER Heard About
episodes.description:
We look into one of the most chilling and dark communities that we have talked about: Colonia Dignidad. We will see how Paul Schäfer, a p3do religious leader who was a medic in the Reich Labor Service (a paramilitary organization established by Nazi Germany), managed to start and control a community that even catered to then-Chilean dictator Augusto Pinochet, and the horrors that came with this evangelical community that would literally (and legally) steal children, force slave labor, and hoard military equipment. WELCOME TO CAMP 🏕️

Make Sure To Follow @History-Camp

episodes.title: FBI Agent Exposes Satanic Rituals of Neo Nazi Cult
episodes.description:
Scott Payne, former FBI agent, is in the tent today to tell us some of his best undercover stories. Scott tells us about how he infiltrated a neo-Nazi cult who sacrificed a goat, took down a faction of the Outlaws Biker Gang and negotiating extortion with the Cartel. 
Welcome to CAMP⛺!

episodes.title: The CIA Asset Turned Cult Killer: Charles Manson Explained
episodes.description: Was Charles Manson a CIA asset or a crazy hippie? Today, we explore Manson's troubled childhood (literally traded for beer), his strange connections to Hollywood and the music scene, and the horrific Tate-LaBianca murders that shocked the nation. episodes.title: Hollywood Sex Cult EXPOSED: The Man Who Killed NXIVM
episodes.description:
Frank Parlato Jr. is an American publisher widely credited for bringing attention to the NXIVM cult in 2017. Frank's experience working for the cult and later facing legal retaliation for defecting makes this among the best inside looks at one of the most insidious cults in American history.
